title: [Large-Scale] Collaborative Microlearning Design for Intermediate Language Proficiency via Mobile Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Teacher collaboration and learner-customized content-sharing environments using online learning design tools

learning_goals: Learners improve intermediate-level language communication skills through 15-minute microlearning modules three times weekly in mobile environments
Learners collaborate with peers to design and provide feedback on at least two language projects using online collaboration tools
Learners demonstrate grammar/vocabulary/pragmatic competence in the target language with over 80% achievement in summative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
